title: Global Bank Digital Transformation
description: Complete digital transformation of core banking systems serving 50M+ customers across 25 countries.
challenge: Legacy systems causing operational inefficiencies and poor customer experience
solution: Cloud-native microservices architecture with real-time processing capabilities

title: Telemedicine Platform Development
description: Comprehensive telemedicine platform connecting patients with healthcare providers globally.
challenge: Need for secure, scalable platform for remote healthcare delivery
solution: HIPAA-compliant platform with video consultations and AI-powered diagnostics

title: Omnichannel Retail Experience
description: Unified shopping experience across online, mobile, and physical stores with personalized recommendations.
challenge: Fragmented customer experience across multiple touchpoints
solution: AI-powered personalization engine with unified inventory management

title: 5G Network Infrastructure
description: Next-generation 5G network deployment with edge computing capabilities for enhanced connectivity.
challenge: Upgrading legacy infrastructure to support 5G and edge computing
solution: Cloud-native network functions with automated orchestration and monitoring

title: Connected Car Platform
description: IoT-enabled connected car platform with predictive maintenance and autonomous driving features.
challenge: Integrating multiple vehicle systems with cloud-based analytics
solution: Real-time data processing platform with machine learning for predictive insights

title: Smart Manufacturing Solution
description: Industry 4.0 transformation with IoT sensors, predictive analytics, and automated quality control.
challenge: Manual processes causing inefficiencies and quality issues
solution: Comprehensive IoT platform with real-time monitoring and AI-driven optimization

title: Digital Payment Platform
description: Secure, scalable payment processing platform supporting multiple currencies and payment methods.
challenge: Building PCI-compliant platform with global payment support
solution: Microservices architecture with advanced fraud detection and real-time processing

title: AI-Powered Medical Diagnostics
description: Machine learning platform for medical image analysis and automated diagnostic assistance.
challenge: Improving diagnostic accuracy and reducing analysis time
solution: Deep learning models trained on medical imaging data with clinical workflow integration
